title: Classes
content: I wanna confirm if pes will wait for 1st round cet students to start classes,some are telling they will wait and some are saying they won't. Also if they start w/o cet students then when will they start for the pessat students?

comments.body: Pes will start after the 1st round of cet.They'll start uni with pessat n 1st round of cet guys, later on the second round students are gonna join
